p: The IC 50 and CC 50 values was calculating by using the SPSS version 24 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, USA). Data analysis was carried out by Prism 7.01 software (GraphPad Software, CA, USA). The differences between extract-treated groups and control group or Glucantime were analyzed by ANOVA. Also, t-test was used to analyze the difference between plant extracts. P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
